sentence: It is a beautiful day.
translation: 今天天氣很晴朗。

sentence: I usually wake up at 7 A.M.
translation: 我通常早上七點醒來。

sentence: He has the ability to make me smile.
translation: 他有能力讓我微笑。

sentence: Will you be able to attend the party?
translation: 你能夠參加派對嗎？

sentence: The bank is about two blocks away from the bank.
translation: 銀行距離這家銀行大約兩個街區。

sentence: He places his family above everything else.
translation: 他把他的家庭放在所有事情之上。

sentence: She studied abroad for a year.
translation: 她在國外學習了一年。

sentence: Sam was absent yesterday because he was sick.
translation: 山姆昨天缺席了，因為他生病了。

sentence: I decided to accept his invitation.
translation: 我決定接受他的邀請。

sentence: The driver from last night's accident was uninjured.
translation: 昨晚那場事故的司機沒有受傷。

sentence: I want to achieve my goals.
translation: 我想要實現我的目標。

sentence: The baby who lives across the street is adorable.
translation: 住在街對面的那個嬰兒很可愛。

sentence: Please don't act as if you know everything.
translation: 請不要表現得像你什麼都知道一樣。

sentence: In order to make your dream come true, you must take some action.
translation: 為了實現你的夢想，你必須採取一些行動。

sentence: The students in Miss Beamer's class are very active.
translation: 畢默老師班上的學生非常活躍。

sentence: My favorite weekend activity is going to the movies.
translation: 我最喜歡的週末活動是去看電影。

sentence: Tom Cruise is my favorite actor.
translation: 湯姆克魯斯是我最喜歡的男演員。

sentence: This actress is beautiful and talented.
translation: 這位女演員既美麗又有天賦。

sentence: He doesn't like parties, but he is actually coming to this one!
translation: 他不喜歡派對，但他實際上會來參加這個！

sentence: Would you like to add some sugar in your coffee?
translation: 你想在咖啡裡加點糖嗎？

sentence: My pet is the newest addition to my family.
translation: 我的寵物是我家庭最新的成員。

sentence: Please give me your phone number and address.
translation: 請給我你的電話號碼和地址。

sentence: I admire people who have good principles.
translation: 我欽佩有良好原則的人。

sentence: I admit this mistake was partly my fault.
translation: 我承認這個錯誤部分是我的錯。

sentence: This couple wants to adopt a girl from Vietnam.
translation: 這對夫婦想收養一個越南女孩。

sentence: You are officially an adult when you turn 18.
translation: 你滿 18 歲時就正式成為成年人了。

sentence: After you complete this level, you can advance to the next.
translation: 完成這一級後，你就可以晉級下一級了。

sentence: Her biggest advantage is having a great attitude.
translation: 她最大的優勢是擁有良好的態度。

sentence: Did you see the advertisement on the front page of the paper?
translation: 你看到報紙頭版的廣告了嗎？

sentence: Thank you for your great advice.
translation: 謝謝你寶貴的建議。

sentence: I strongly advise you to reconsider your decision.
translation: 我強烈建議你重新考慮你的決定。

sentence: Don't worry about this minor affair.
translation: 不要擔心這件小事。

sentence: My parents' opinions affect my decisions.
translation: 我父母的意見會影響我的決定。

sentence: Don't be afraid of the dark.
translation: 不要害怕黑暗。

sentence: Let's go watch a movie after dinner.
translation: 晚餐後我們去看電影吧。

sentence: Isn't this a lovely afternoon?
translation: 這不是一個可愛的下午嗎？

sentence: I hope we'll see each other again.
translation: 我希望我們能再次見面。

sentence: I can't do this for you because it's against my belief.
translation: 我不能為你做這件事，因為這違背我的信仰。

sentence: What's your age?
translation: 你的年齡是多少？

sentence: I arrived home ten minutes ago.
translation: 我十分鐘前到家。

sentence: Does your team agree with you?
translation: 你的團隊同意你的意見嗎？

sentence: He is arriving ahead of schedule.
translation: 他提前到達了。

sentence: Taiwan frequently sends aid to less developed countries.
translation: 台灣經常向較不發達的國家提供援助。

sentence: The aim is to put AIDS law into law.
translation: 目標是將愛滋病法律納入法律。

sentence: My aim is to go into law school.
translation: 我的目標是進入法學院。

sentence: I cannot stand polluted air.
translation: 我無法忍受受污染的空氣。

sentence: The engineers designed a new aircraft.
translation: 工程師設計了一架新的飛行器。

sentence: Which airline are you flying?
translation: 你乘坐哪家航空公司？

sentence: This airplane seats more than 400 passengers.
translation: 這架飛機可容納 400 多名乘客。

sentence: The airport is a place of partings and reunions.
translation: 機場是分離和重逢的地方。

sentence: Remember to set the alarm for your morning class.
translation: 記得為你的早課設定鬧鐘。

sentence: My mother likes to keep all her photographs in an album.
translation: 我媽媽喜歡把她所有的照片都放在相簿裡。

sentence: My sister and I are very alike.
translation: 我姐姐和我非常相似。

sentence: After three days of hunger, she was still alive.
translation: 餓了三天後，她仍然活著。

sentence: May mommy and daddy give me all of their love.
translation: 願爸爸媽媽給我他們所有的愛。

sentence: My parents allow me to eat McDonald's once a week.
translation: 我的父母允許我每週吃一次麥當勞。

sentence: I hope you're hungry because dinner is almost ready.
translation: 我希望你餓了，因為晚餐快準備好了。

sentence: I enjoy spending time alone.
translation: 我喜歡獨自度過時光。

sentence: We took a walk along the stream.
translation: 我們沿著小溪散步。

sentence: Please recite this poem aloud.
translation: 請大聲朗誦這首詩。

sentence: Do you know the English alphabet?
translation: 你知道英文字母表嗎？

sentence: I'm not hungry because I've already eaten.
translation: 我不餓，因為我已經吃過了。

sentence: I like apples and I also like bananas.
translation: 我喜歡蘋果，我也喜歡香蕉。

sentence: Although it rained all weekend, I still had a wonderful time.
translation: 雖然整個週末都在下雨，但我仍然玩得很開心。

sentence: There are 7 children altogether.
translation: 總共有七個孩子。

sentence: My best friend is always there to listen to me.
translation: 我最好的朋友總是在那裡傾聽我。

sentence: I am going to Indonesia next year.
translation: 我明年要去印度尼西亞。

sentence: The ambulance arrived 5 minutes after the emergency phone call.
translation: 緊急電話打來五分鐘後，救護車就到了。

sentence: My grandparents moved to America.
translation: 我的祖父母搬到了美國。

sentence: My English teacher is American.
translation: 我的英文老師是美國人。

sentence: Sue is the brightest child among her friends.
translation: 蘇是她朋友中最聰明的孩子。

sentence: What is the total amount of our dinner bill?
translation: 我們晚餐帳單的總金額是多少？

sentence: I am curious about ancient Egypt.
translation: 我對古埃及很好奇。

sentence: She is always cheerful and optimistic.
translation: 她總是開朗樂觀。

sentence: My mom tells me I'm her guardian angel.
translation: 我媽媽告訴我我是她的守護天使。

sentence: You need to learn to control your anger.
translation: 你需要學習控制你的憤怒。

sentence: He was angry because she lied.
translation: 他很生氣，因為她撒謊了。

sentence: What's your favorite animal?
translation: 你最喜歡的動物是什麼？

sentence: I broke my ankle when I fell.
translation: 我跌倒時弄傷了腳踝。

sentence: May I please have another cup of coffee?
translation: 我可以再要一杯咖啡嗎？

sentence: You know the answer to your own question.
translation: 你知道你自己的問題的答案。

sentence: There is a big black ant on my cake!
translation: 我的蛋糕上有一隻大黑螞蟻！

sentence: Do you need any butter for your bagel?
translation: 你的貝果需要奶油嗎？

sentence: Does anybody know where Tom is?
translation: 有人知道湯姆在哪裡嗎？

sentence: Would anyone like to join me for dinner?
translation: 有人想和我一起吃晚餐嗎？

sentence: If you could have anything for Christmas, what would you ask for?
translation: 如果聖誕節你可以擁有任何東西，你會想要什麼？

sentence: I will give you a lift because I'm going that way anyway.
translation: 我會載你一程，因為我反正也要往那個方向去。

sentence: Is there anywhere you'd like to visit?
translation: 你有想去任何地方看看嗎？

sentence: My apartment is small, but cozy.
translation: 我的公寓很小，但很舒適。

sentence: You should apologize for being late.
translation: 你應該為遲到道歉。

sentence: Don't suddenly appear at my door!
translation: 不要突然出現在我的門口！

sentence: Your sudden appearance startled me.
translation: 你的突然出現嚇到我了。

sentence: Snow White took a bite of the poisonous apple.
translation: 白雪公主咬了一口毒蘋果。

sentence: This regulation does not apply to everyone.
translation: 這條規定並不適用於所有人。

sentence: I really appreciate your thoughtfulness.
translation: 我非常感謝你的體貼。

sentence: It rains a lot in April.
translation: 四月經常下雨。

sentence: We are life-long companions.
translation: 我們是終身的伴侶。

sentence: This is a non-smoking area.
translation: 這是非吸煙區。

sentence: My parents never argue in front of me.
translation: 我的父母從不在我面前爭吵。

sentence: My right arm is more muscular than my left.
translation: 我的右臂比左臂更有肌肉。

sentence: My armchair is a place of great comfort.
translation: 我的扶手椅是一個非常舒適的地方。

sentence: This is a well-trained army.
translation: 這是一支訓練有素的軍隊。

sentence: Let's meet around 2 o'clock.
translation: 我們兩點左右見面吧。

sentence: I like to arrange the furniture in my house.
translation: 我喜歡整理家裡的家具。

sentence: The policemen are planning to arrest the drug dealers tonight.
translation: 警察計劃今晚逮捕毒販。

sentence: Please arrive 2 hours before your flight.
translation: 請在你的航班起飛前兩小時到達。

sentence: Cooking is a fine art.
translation: 烹飪是一門精緻的藝術。

sentence: Did you read today's article about women in the Middle East?
translation: 你讀了今天關於中東女性的文章嗎？

sentence: This artist has produced some very unique pieces of artwork.
translation: 這位藝術家創作了一些非常獨特的藝術作品。

sentence: She is as thin as a stick.
translation: 她瘦得像根棍子。

sentence: Asia is rapidly developing.
translation: 亞洲正在迅速發展。

sentence: I love Asian cuisine.
translation: 我喜歡亞洲菜。

sentence: I was going to help you even if you didn't ask.
translation: 即使你不問，我也打算幫助你。

sentence: When I came home last night, you were already asleep.
translation: 昨晚我回家時，你已經睡著了。

sentence: I worked as a research assistant for many years.
translation: 我擔任研究助理多年。

sentence: Don't assume you know everything.
translation: 不要假設你什麼都知道。

sentence: I go to bed at midnight.
translation: 我在午夜上床睡覺。

sentence: The terrorists threatened to attack the city hall.
translation: 恐怖分子威脅要攻擊市政廳。

sentence: Would you like to attend my graduation ceremony?
translation: 你想參加我的畢業典禮嗎？

sentence: Pay attention to your teacher.
translation: 請注意聽老師講課。

sentence: The audience really enjoyed the show.
translation: 觀眾們非常喜歡這場演出。

sentence: August is the perfect month for ice-cream.
translation: 八月是吃冰淇淋的最佳月份。

sentence: I have an aunt who lives in Taipei.
translation: 我有一個住在台北的阿姨。

sentence: Australia is a beautiful country.
translation: 澳洲是一個美麗的國家。

sentence: What's your favorite Australian animal?
translation: 你最喜歡的澳洲動物是什麼？

sentence: My favorite season is autumn.
translation: 我最喜歡的季節是秋天。

sentence: My doctor isn't available until next week.
translation: 我的醫生直到下週才有空。

sentence: I try to avoid crowded places.
translation: 我盡量避免去擁擠的地方。

sentence: Are you aware of her presence?
translation: 你注意到她的存在了嗎？

sentence: Her children have all moved away.
translation: 她的孩子們都搬走了。
